channel.title: S3 on IT Blog
channel.description: Recent content in S3 on IT Blog

item.title: Veeam Backup: Best Practices and Configuration Guide
item.description: Best practices and secure architecture patterns for deploying Veeam Backup & Replication in local and remote environments.

item.title: Veeam Local Repositories in Practice: Hardened Linux, MinIO S3, iSCSI over WireGuard on Synology NAS
item.description: Complete hands-on guide to configuring secure local backup repositories for Veeam, including Hardened Linux, MinIO S3 with Object Lock, and iSCSI over WireGuard on Synology NAS.
